Click the following link to watch video: https://share.newscasts.refinitiv.com/link?entryId=1_09kveete&referenceId=tag:reuters.com,2021:newsml_OVF7BMWDN_K15&pageId=RefinitivNewscasts
Source: Thomson Reuters

Description: Residents of Venezuela's Lake Maracaibo long ago became accustomed to its dark waters, tinted black by oil pollution. But worsening contamination has changed the lake's color, spangling it with green algae. Lucy Fielder reports.
Short Link: https://refini.tv/3rOpl4q
